statements: SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY sender_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id HAVING total_messages > 10;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 3 ORDER BY message_id ASC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 4 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 50 ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 100;
SELECT provider_name, provider_phone FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_id > 5;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients, healthcare_providers WHERE patients.patient_id = healthcare_providers.provider_id;
SELECT patient_name, provider_name FROM patients JOIN healthcare_providers ON patients.patient_id = healthcare_providers.provider_id ORDER BY patients.patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM healthcare_providers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_phone, provider_address FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM encrypted_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id FROM patients
SELECT provider_name, provider_email, COUNT(*) AS total_providers FROM healthcare_providers GROUP BY provider_name, provider_email
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, receiver_id FROM encrypted_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT contact_email, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_address='123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE insurance_info='Full Coverage';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE is_encrypted=true;
SELECT attachment_id, file_name, file_url FROM attachments ORDER BY attachment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address, contact_email FROM patients WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT m.message_text, m.timestamp, p.patient_name FROM messages m JOIN patients p ON m.receiver_id = p.patient_id WHERE m.sender_id = 1;
SELECT a.file_name, a.file_url FROM attachments a JOIN messages m ON a.message_id = m.message_id WHERE m.is_encrypted = TRUE;
SELECT name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentistry';
SELECT id, name, email FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_message_timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 OR receiver_id = 5;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY specialty ASC, name DESC;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, hp.name AS provider_name, m.message_text FROM patients p JOIN conversations c ON p.id = c.patient_id JOIN healthcare_providers hp ON c.provider_id = hp.id JOIN messages m ON m.sender_id = hp.id WHERE c.start_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND c.end_timestamp <= '2022-03-31';
